required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Adalimumab and Tofacitinib in the Treatment of Active Takayasu Arteritis
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-labelï¼ŒRandomized Controlled, Multicenter Study of Adalimumab and Tofacitinib in the Treatment of Active Takayasu Arteritis

lead_sponsor.agency: Chinese SLE Treatment And Research Group

clinical_study.source: Chinese SLE Treatment And Research Group

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective,open-labelled,multi-center,randomized clincial trial.It comapres the clincal efficiacy and safety of there 2 drugs in the treatment of relapse active Takayasu's arteritis patients.

detailed_description.textblock:
In this study, 100 active relapse Takayasu's arteritis patients will be enrolled. Patients are randomized into the adalimubmab treatment group and tofacitinib treatment.Patients will also be treated with reduced dose of glucocortoid at the same time. The primary end point is the percentage of patients who are in complete response and maintain in complete response at week 52.
The efficiacy will be evulated at week 12, 24, 36 and 52. If patient are not respond to one drug at week 12,then they will be changed to being treated with another intervention.Safety is also monitored during the study.

primary_outcome.measure: percentage of patients with complete response
primary_outcome.description: percentage of patients with complete response at week 52

secondary_outcome.measure: percentage of patients with partial response
secondary_outcome.description: percentage of patients with partial response at week 52

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage with image disease at the end of study
secondary_outcome.description: percentage of patients with stable disease deminstrated by CTA or Doppler at week 52
safety profile of both Adalimumab and Tofacitinib
percentage who require intervention procedures in both groups

arm_group.description: Adalimumab, 40mg subcutaneous injection, every 2 week, for 52 weeks.

intervention.description: Adalimumab Ab is adminstrated subcutaneouls every other week for 52 weeks

facility.name: The General Hospital of the People's Liberation Army
